website_summaries.verdict: An over-the-shoulder carry-on designed specifically with current airline regulations in mind.
pros: Helps you avoid extra fees on the airlines
Helps you travel light, but still fits a lot
cons: The strap on this bag isn't detachable and bag doesn't have wheels

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for spirit airline personal item!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for our 3 day getaway. If you've ever flown spirit than you know everything costs money, so in trying to avoid a carry on fee I puchased both the black & purple bag to use as our personal bags. This bag was surprisingly durable. I loved that it met spirits size requirement. I felt like I was able to stuff ALOT in this bag and yet it still fit in the bag sizer.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda879

customer_reviews.title: Bring it on United Basic Economy!
customer_reviews.text: Inside this regulation size personal bag I have managed to fit: laptop & cord, toiletry bag, makeup bag, wallet, pjs, clothes for 4 days! I packed thin tops, and will be wearing my sweater, hoodie, and anorak onto the flight. I hate checking luggage!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Tough Little Bag
customer_reviews.text: I packed this thing FULL. I mean FULL. To the point where I had to shove a knee in the side of the bag to close the zipper. I used this as my carry on with Wow airlines. Went to London from LA. To Dublin, to Belfast, back to Dublin, then back to LA. Held up great and met the strict size requirements. I was able to get in 2 pairs of jeans, 3 thick long sleeve shirts, 2 t-shirts, 5 pairs of socks, 5 pairs of boxer briefs, one pair of gym shorts, and a bunch of sweets to take home. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: bvans

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for a 5-day trip to London on Wow Air. I refused to pay the baggage fees, and this bag is within the free ‘personal item’ dimensions. Using space saver compression bags, I was able to fit 3 pants, 6 tees, 3 long-sleeve shirts, 6 underwear and socks, a light pair of shoes, and travel-size toiletries. It held up nicely and was easy to tote around, making travel so much easier. It fit comfortably under the plane seat in front of me. What’s best is I saved money and didn’t contribute to the billion$ the airlines rake in from baggage fees!
customer_reviews.author: atphilly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Fit 4 days worth of clothing, toiletry bag, plus a jean jacket. Had room to spare under the seat on Spirit.
customer_reviews.author: Leonore Lizano

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The true size is 16 x 10 x 6, not 16 x 10 x 8.
customer_reviews.author: RCurva

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my Expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! My husband and I purchased two of them to serve as our personal items for Spirit Airlines (since they fit the measurement requirements). They worked fantastic and fit right under the seat in front of us. Honestly, for the price, we were surprised what great quality they were. These will get a lot of use by us outside of this trip and we would both highly recommend them. One small issue is that the straps do not have any padding (and can dig into your shoulders if your bad is heavy), but really, this is a small gripe with these bags being such a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect Personal-sized items for our flights on United, which has a smaller item size than some other airlines. I also like that I'm able to fold it flat when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: KDennison

customer_reviews.title: I decided on this particular one as the dimensions fit the Spirit dimensions perfectly and looked the most plain (in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: Flying for the first time and taking Spirit for a spur of the moment trip I was low key freaking out about what to get to fit the awkward sizing. I decided on this particular one as the dimensions fit the Spirit dimensions perfectly and looked the most plain (in a good way), regular bag that got the job done. Felt it had more space than other bags I have seen my friends have but maybe I am biased. Tip: Roll the clothes like a burrito to maximize space!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Fits easily under a budget airlines seat.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this bag is light, and fit under the seat flying both Frontier, and United recently with plenty of room to spare under the seat. It’s the perfect personal item for a budget airline, if you don’t want to pay for a carry on. The price for product was very reasonable. It’s also quite cute.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M Blackmer

customer_reviews.title: Great personal item!
customer_reviews.text: Held two dresses, 2 shorts, one long sweater pancho, undergarments, a small brush, and make-up bag on the way to Texas. Coming back to Colorado.. I added 4 t-shirts, 2 long skirts, a shirt, pants, sundress, and tank top. The front pocket had my cell phone, charger, keys, gum, pen, boarding pass, and ear buds. Fit perfectly under the seat in front of me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot inside, great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest of quality but it gets the job done for a great price. Recently flew with United and their carry-on sizes are much stricter than other airlines, so I was looking for something smaller just for this one trip. These bags were perfect; held a lot more than I expected and fit perfectly under the seat of the plane. Loved the straps to hook along the our rolling luggage handle, it made walking thru the airport much easier. I didn't expect much for the price, but I was happily surprised and will be using these bags again for our other upcoming trips.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fits underneath United and Frontier Airlines
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something I could store away under the seat and not have to pay carry on fees. I saw this bag on YouTube where the guy was giving a product review. I’m so glad I purchased this! Purchased two; black for my husband and the purple one for myself. It is very roomy! Packed for a 4 day stay in Miami and everything fit very nicely! Bag held up very well for the first use and am hoping to get more use out of this bag. Material is very sturdy though locks that came with the bag broke almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Great for occasional flyers
customer_reviews.text: Pros: fit enough items for a day carry-on. 2x bags fit under one seat on United airlines flight. Had no issues getting them to fit. One bag would easily fit under window and asle seat. Cons: they are cheaper bags and therefore not the best shoulder strap for long term holding/carrying. It is lacking padding and digs into the shoulder a bit (over 45min) depending on weight you place inside. I and partner traveled with the bags. In one bag I fit small purse inside (clutch style) folders, planner, headphones, snack food, change of clothes (light shirt/shorts). I fly just a couple times a year and this works great for the price. I did not "overstuff" my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Awesome Price
customer_reviews.text: I love the this bag. I had a similar size bag that a friend gave me, but the zipper broke. I was using the bag as storage for my work computer and other teaching materials. I was surprised by how spacious the bag was. The color is nice to look at. Besides the spaciousness which was a must, the price was an amazing bargain. I would recommend this bag to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Meets Spirit's & Wow's Carry-On Requirements
customer_reviews.text: I am flying on Spirit from Dallas to Baltimore and Wow from Baltimore to Germany. Spirit and Wow have different size limits for Carry-Ons. As you can see this bag meets both Airlines' limit. I have 1 pair of jeans, a hoody and sweat pants, swimmimg trunks, 4 shirts, 4 pair of socks and underwear, a PS4 game and a box of twinkies.
customer_reviews.author: Docvader76513

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - flimsy strap tore on first use
customer_reviews.text: Beware, beware, beware! Initially really pleased with this bag - bought it in advance of an international trip to meet WOW air guidelines; it packed like a dream and fit the airline requirements with no problem. Five seconds after I got through security, the shoulder strap completely tore off the bag. The handle is small and ineffective; I’m at the airport now having to carry it in both arms like a child. This is day one of vacation and hour six of my first use of this bag. Wasted my money and now have to double the expense to buy a new bag in a foreign country. A good vendor would offer a replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A great carry on bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for an upcoming trip and have no complaints. It's surprisingly spacious, lightweight, and sits nicely on the top of just about any suitcase. I definitely plan to use this bag again on any future trips.
customer_reviews.author: J.V.

customer_reviews.title: Meets Requirements
customer_reviews.text: Had no issues with United or Spirit. Hand Luggage fit in both airlines sizing bins with room to spare. I think I packed 5 outfits, pajamas, 1 pair of heels, 2 pairs of sandals and a small toiletry bag. I’ve only used it for one trip so hopefully it hold up. Either way it was worth the price just for that one trip!
customer_reviews.author: Kisha

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I didn’t like was the lock it came with very
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my first flight on Spirit and was worth every penny. I had no issues with using as a free personal item; fits perfectly in the personal item container check. My wife was able to pack 3 days of clothes, electronics, snacks,makeup, and liquids bag; with plenty of room to spare. The only thing I didn’t like was the lock it came with very cheap
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: zippers seem reasonably good, and it fits perfectly under the seat
customer_reviews.text: This bag meets the size requirements for a United Airlines "personal item". Exterior pocket was handy to keep boarding passes and passport secure but available. The bag does hold quite a bit, zippers seem reasonably good, and it fits perfectly under the seat, even in the confines of a small commuter aircraft. The shoulder strap is not removable, relatively thin, and riveted to the bag - not a good option for heavy items or as a checked bag. The fabric feels like a thin canvas, so may not be durable over a long period if you travel extensively. It met my needs to hold a jacket, paperwork, tablet computer, wallet, and a book on several United flights.
customer_reviews.author: Jomierbm

customer_reviews.title: Right size, very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: While it is the perfect dimensions for a carry on personal item I was terribly disappointed with the quality. After my fourth day of travel the loop on the rigjt side of the bag the stap goes through tore completely leaving me to carry this with both arms the rest of my trip. All around bummed out by this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: First trip was this week handle ripped we were on a cruise ship i have a sewing kit with me i had to sew by had just to get my personal stuff back home not happy at all. Only one star because this wouldn't let me to send this unless i put at least one star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this new bag. It is well made, easy to wipe clean, holds the full size toiletries that I purchased it f, slides over my luggage handles and is light weight. Been looking for a bag like this for a long time to use during my frequent travels and that I can keep stocked with my full size products.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Galvin-halcro

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Took on vacation one time and the inside lining ripped in two days. I realize this is an inexpensive bag but it was perfect for what I wanted. The size was just right and the two separate compartments worked well. This bag was very loosely packed and used mostly to carry paperwork, passports etc. The inside lining material felt like paper. I would pass on this bag. Can't return it because it's past the deadline. Very disappointing that Amazon allows products like this to be sold.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Bad odor
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a cute bag. It is the perfect size for Spirit Airlines and fit what I needed for a weekend getaway. The only complaint I have is the smell. It is really strong. I had it sit out for a couple of days, but the smell remains. It is a pretty strong smell. Other than that, it is a good bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Really nice travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. Perfect size and you can lock it. I love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strap is very weak.  Flimsy bag.
customer_reviews.text: First time used was this week as a carry-on bag for a change of clothes and electronics. The shoulder strap almost completely tore off of one of the bags, so it had to be carried by the top handle which made carrying other items very difficult. Bags are very flimsy and the straps are apparently very weak and not good for a dependable carry-on with minimal weight.
customer_reviews.author: Roy F. Kees

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This can be filled to capacity and American Airlines acceptable. I love that it is hassle free. Great, great, great!
customer_reviews.author: MightyMe87

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags For The Money!
customer_reviews.text: These are great boarding bags. Just the right size for travel. Love the look and material as well. I really like the fact that you can attach the bag to another bags handle with the strap attached on the back. The reason I gave it only four stars is due to the fact that you can't take the shoulder strap off and it only has one handle to carry it without using the strap. Otherwise I really like the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Weekender
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as a "personal item" for Frontier Airlines. Holds enough for a weekend trip.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Strap BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Nice material and perfect size. The issue is that they broke day 2 with minimal weight inside. Straps pulled right off. And I initiated a return but I was on vacation in Florida so I missed the deadline and was told I'm stuck with 2 broken bags for $30
customer_reviews.author: Buddhaman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect airline personal item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size to use as a personal item for the small budget airlines instead of a tote. (I do not like having big handles flopping about.) This small duffle actually fits under the increasingly scaled down space below the seat in front, yet it holds quite a bit in the main section, including a small purse. The outer zippered pocket is just right for phone or boarding pass, charger, earphones, or e-reader. Nice to have the option of a shoulder strap. It is my go-to bag now when I fly. It's quite practical for other occasions to carry a lot of small items. Wish it came in other colors, but black is always good.
customer_reviews.author: LSDV

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for carryon.
customer_reviews.text: This Carry On Flight Duffle bag worked well on my flights even though it only has one zipped pocket on the side. The pocket was big enough to hold two 10" iPads but has no padding to protect them. Inside is all one space with no pockets. The back strap that keeps your bag on top of your wheeled luggage works great. The bag material is not very thick but does fold up to take less space to store. It was a good fit under the seat of the airline. It allowed at least one leg to be stretched out alongside it and sometimes both legs, depending on the seat supports.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: would definitely recommend it to avoid those baggage's fees
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what I was looking for, me and my boyfriend will be flying with Spirit next month going to Vegas for 3 days. I tired packing to see what all I could fit and so far I was able to fit 2 pairs of shorts, pair of jeans, at least 7 shirts, sandals anddd a pair of open toed booties. Still had a little wiggle room and that was not including packing the front pocket which I'm sure ill put all the small toiletries. Very excited to see how it turns out once the trip arrives, would definitely recommend it to avoid those baggage's fees.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than it appears. Plus there was such a pungent smell to the bag that just doesn't dissipate. Don't bother purchasing. Save you sense of smell.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simply cheaply made garbage. The separation panel between the outside and inside compartments ripped out after only 24 hours with very few items in it. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: damon466

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great travel bag for the price, when I first got it and opened it I didn’t feel like it would hold as much as I needed it to but surprisingly it holds a lot. Seems sturdy, I’ve used it a few times and no signs of wear yet. Great features, fits under the seat perfectly and has a slide loop for suitcase handle. Comes with lock also if you would want to lock it. This trip I fit all my toiletries, make up, a book, my crossbody purse and some other miscellaneous items. Over all great carry on bag for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kari1020

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Petite carry-on!
customer_reviews.text: This carry-on meets the measurements required by the airline, as "one personal item." This relieved my mind from worry about having something too big and having to pay an added fee at the airport. How glad I am such economical, pretty luggage is available!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carry-on for United Airlines✈
customer_reviews.text: Just traveled on ✈ from Newark,NJ to Bangor, Maine on United Airlines and it worked perfectly. I stowed it under the seat in front of me with no problems. The bag 👜seems very well made plus it meets the guidelines for United Airlines ✈👍I definitely would highly recommend ➕ would purchase again. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Rich B.

customer_reviews.title: Allegiant Airlines Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag specifically to fly through Allegiant Airlines as my free luggage item. It fit perfectly under the seat! Fits enough clothing for 4-5 days if you get creative with your packing. The straps are comfortable. Love the front pocket for easy access to in flight essentials. For the price it is totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: amazonshoppers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for United Basic Economy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for United Basic Economy, fits under the seat with room to spare. I was able to fit in four dresses, a sweater, three pairs of leggings, shorts and tank top, under garments, make up bag, toiletries quart size bag, straightening iron, and kindle with room to spare. I even shoved in my jacket (down puffer coat) while in the airport. So it was more than enough room for a quick get away. The strap got twisted so 4 stars but it held up well and I’ll use it again. Plan to replace the metal that connects the strap to the bag. Great purchase especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JulesAnn

customer_reviews.title: Carry on
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to fly the cheap seats on United. When I opened the package, I thought I'd be returning it as it looks very small. However, I was able to pack three days worth of clothes in it (casual), with room for toiletries. Just need to roll up the pants. Seems well made as well. I haven't traveled yet, so we'll see how it holds up, but I'm impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great size, fits Spirts 1 free personal item bag
customer_reviews.text: Size was perfect for sprit airlines free personal item bag. Packed 5 night worth of clothes, toiletries and sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag was a great find! I needed a bag that would fit ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a great find! I needed a bag that would fit the strict dimensions of United's personal carry on, and this was perfect! It's quite roomy considering its size. I was able to take a carry-on 22-inch suitcase and this bag on a 6-day trip, and I was able to fit everything I needed in both with room to spare. This bag fit perfectly under the seat in front of me on the United flight. The aisle seat had the smallest area for underseat bags, and this fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable Shoulder Strap
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a 5 day work trip and the size was great: fit everything I needed and fit under the seat in front of me (United Basic Economy). The front pocket even fit my Lenovo Thinkpad x230 laptop (11.75"x8"x1") The quality of the bag is good, except for the shoulder strap. On one side it's sewn to the bag directly. On the other, there is a rectangular metal fastener that flips and twists around. The strap is super uncomfortable and can't easily be replaced. The handles seemed solid though, so I used those most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Bluskyz

customer_reviews.title: Small but strong.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for me and my sister for a short trip. We didnt want to have to pay for a carryon so these were the right size that we wouldn't have to. They came packaged well and they fit everything we needed to take. They held up to the travel I will recommend these to our friends for future trips.
customer_reviews.author: Mena

customer_reviews.title: Love this travel bag - very durable
customer_reviews.text: I just used this bag for a trip to Europe. I love that it has the strap to put on top of your rolling suitcase, made it super convenient for airport travel. Perfect underseat size! Always fits even the most limited airline (as some have more restriction on size). One flight was with Ryanair and it was perfect. Love all all the pockets and quite roomy for the size. I crammed quite a bit in this bag and the design/colors are attractive.
customer_reviews.author: krngallo

customer_reviews.title: Bag is actually 16x10x8
customer_reviews.text: The sellers description gives a smaller dimension that would allow this as a personal item on some flights. Unfortunately the carrier I'm flying with has a max size of 7" while the description says 6" and the actual bag has a tag that says 8"
customer_reviews.author: Slowcars4life

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bags based on the positive reviews. Went on a weekend trip to Orlando and as I was about to deplane the strap broke. I will say the bag does qualify as a personal item. It was just very frustrating trying to carry this bag around with no strap and a three year old. The other bag held up fine. All I can say is buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Fly With No Fees
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these bags! Perfect for any airline we flew United and Spirit with these no problem. You can actually fit SO MUCH STUFF in these tiny bags it’s crazy! Well made and have had no trouble with them so far, we take them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: United/American airlines carry on approved
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bag to take on a United/American airlines flight that was within their carry on code. After looking at reviews here in Amazon I found these and a review that stated they are approved for these airlines (we didn't want to check bags for $40 each). Anyone who is reading these are 100% carry on approved for United and American airlines. They worked perfectly for us as we travel light to avoid the checked bag process. They held 4 days worth of clothing and travel sized toiletries obviously because we didn't check this bag haha
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Cifelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice side pocket for passports an important papers airplane friendly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I can carry on some stuff on the airplane as my free item on a few Airlines its cabin friendly. My husband packed his camera laptop and a few pieces of clothing fit fine. I rolled my clothes I got quite a number of items in there you have to be smart with these Airlines nowadays very sturdy and goes on the back of my suitcase
customer_reviews.author: JAN & RICK- FLORIDA

customer_reviews.title: Stinks!
customer_reviews.text: This is really cheaply made and stinks so bad that I would not put anything in it. I would have returned it, but I already had taken of tags and tossed the packaging. This bag will follow the packaging to the trash soon, I would not even want to give this to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Beebs

customer_reviews.title: Would use again
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a life saver, I needed a bag short notice and I stuffed it with clothes and shoes. I fit 3 tops, 2 dresses, 2 swimsuits, 1 pair of shorts, 1pair of pants, 1 pair of sandals, 1 pair of those huge filas and a bag with accessories and hygiene products and it was qualified as a carry-on no question, I will definitely use again it was nice and sturdy and surprisingly spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Jordon

customer_reviews.title: Worked just fine as personal item on Frontier flight
customer_reviews.text: I have tons of bags at home and some would have probably worked as a personal item but technically they were oversized. I did not want to risk paying $70 for a carry on so I ordered this bag. For the price it was well worth it. I stayed 4 days out of it and brought too much. You have to really plan how you are going to pack but it fits under the seat perfectly and Frontier didn't bat an eye. I rarely recommend anything but if you are flying one of these el-cheapo airlines and just want to bring a personal item I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Really great.
customer_reviews.text: Carried this through the airport several times and it held tough. It can carry my makeup and essentials such as shower stuff plus roughly 7 days worth of clothing. I used the velcro strap on the side to hold my flip flops. It fits perfectly under a seat on an airplane. Great carry on for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after one trip
customer_reviews.text: The bag fits perfectly under an airline seat which is why I purchased it to begin with. Having said that, I expected it to last more than one trip. The bag is coming apart at the seams after only 2 uses (flight to my destination and then back home). I did not overpack the bag. I only packed lightweight clothes (tank tops, tights, sun dresses, and one pair of flats). I had next to no toiletries weighing the bag down. If you only intend to use this bag once, go for it. But if you'd like a bag you can use in the future, I'd recommend you looks elsewhere. Very disappointed with how this bag held up.
customer_reviews.author: Sibi

customer_reviews.title: We recommend
customer_reviews.text: So after using these as our personal item on both our flights. I can honestly say we were happy with our bags. It's incredibly roomie and lightweight. The only issue I noticed was the shoulder strap could be a bit sturdier and padded more. I solved this by putting my sweater over that part. I bought 3 of these bags for my family and know one had a problem with them. We also flew on Sun Country and Frontier and we had more then enough room under the seats. Bonus it also came with little locks on the bags.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleH

customer_reviews.title: Great bag body, poor strap. Will replace strap.
customer_reviews.text: Fits PERFECTLY in the Alaska Airlines "personal item" foot space. Holds a LOT of stuff! I love that! What I don't love is that the strap isn't very sturdy and twists on itself after one use. I will keep the bag and try to replace the strap. Seller: please upgrade the strap. It sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Joyful Michelle

customer_reviews.title: liked the roomy space inside and the side pocket is ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hand luggage for an oversea trip but the trip was postponed at the last minute, so I didn't get to use the bag yet. That's why ai give it a 4 star rating today as I haven't get to use it for my trip. liked the roomy space inside and the side pocket is big enough for my travel documents and essential items. The only negative part is the shoulder strap that is sewn to the bag, I can't remove it and replace with my own shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Magic Bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect under seat! Approved for personal item size for economy class travelers. Dont let the small size fool you. I shocked my family back east with everything that fit in this bag. Packed for a 6 day trip. It was a challenge to not check any bags! Two pairs of jeans, one pair of dress pants, four blouses, five pairs of socks, seven undies, makeup bag, overnight bag, small bag for medicines, and a St. Louis Cardinals license plate cover!
customer_reviews.author: Vonryken

customer_reviews.title: worked for my trip
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small bag for my airline as they allow a free personal item. This bag was perfect. There was ample space for 4 days worth of clothes and stuff. The bag is cute and durable and great for the price. My only complaint is that wearing the bag hurt my shoulders. The buffer on the strap didn't help much. Other than that it was great. The bag also has velcro on the back to attach to your luggage cart.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bolanos

customer_reviews.title: It fits on top of a Samsonite Ziplite 4.0 suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoulder strap on the bag for carrying thru the airport. I bought it because it has a nice strap to loop over the handle on my suitcase. It will fit under the seat in front of you on the airplane so you won't have to get into the overhead bin. No inside pockets, but the outsider zipper pocket will fit airlines tickets and personal papers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sisters

customer_reviews.title: Wimpy
customer_reviews.text: I actually found these bags very difficult to travel with. The strap on the back of the bag is not wide enough to secure the bag to the handle of luggage. Even though there is Velcro in the middle of the inside of the strap to help with this issue, it is not strong enough for what the bag can hold. On one occasion the bag was able to flip around the handle of the luggage. We ended up leaving one of the bags at our stay because the zipper malfunctioned leaving us having to purchase a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Ok for occasional light use
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad for the price, but you get what you pay for. The piece of plastic wrapped cardboard that helps the bag hold its shape is not actually attached and moves around when the bag is not full. The material is kind of thin and the strap is not likely to hold up to heavy use. That said, you can't beat the price and if you just need something to occasionally carry around some light items, this will work. I have much better bags, but they also cost 4 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: T. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: You know...this little bag isn't too bad. It's not the highest quality, it feels like a thin canvas with a plastic coating on the interior, and the strap is fairly thin and lightweight. But, it traveled well as my carry-on and main luggage for a weekend trip across county. It's sturdy enough to hold it's shape, has a strong zipper, all seams felt strong, and despite the strap feeling fairly thing it held up well. Don't expect the most premium carry-on bag ever, but for the price this is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for personal item travel
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on an Allegiant Airline! I got 2 sweaters, leggings, 4 pairs of socks/undies, two magnets, small purse, a scarf, a Christmas ornament, makeup, a small bottle of moonshine, and toiletries! Boom. So legit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good temporary weekend bag.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag specifically for flying with Spirit and United. So far I just got it and the quality seems pretty cheap, but you get what you pay for. It fits a couple days worth of items not a problem. Just be careful with how much you stuff in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit smaller than I thought it was going to be though the dimensions were clearly listed. This is the perfect bag if you happen to book one of those flights that has extremely limited carry on provisions (such as United Economy) - where the bag has to go under seat in front of you - and you can only take on ONE thing. This can serve as a purse, and hold some of the items you need with you during your travel. It's also cute and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L. Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small hand luggage for a hassle free flight.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent small size for personal hand luggage that some airlines now force you to use (on their cheap flights, which I often book). Forcing yourself to pack into this small size frees you from all the stuff you normally take on a short trip and end up not even using/wearing. Makes for a "free and easy" trip with so little to carry around or worry about. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized bag. Used it as a personal item for Frontier with no issues. This is the only bag I had for a short trip. I was able to stuff three pairs of shorts, 5 shirts, underclothes, a pair of shoes, toiletries, and a few misc small electronics in this bag. I only knocked two stars off because the stitching in the front pouch between the pouch and the inside of the bag came completely out the first time I used it. Even with the hole in the front pouch, I've used this bag on a few more trips without further issues.
customer_reviews.author: DanoN3t

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on
customer_reviews.text: Needed a basic carry on for a flight with Spirit Airlines. This bag fits in with their dimensions for the free carry on. Cute bag. I was actually able to pack a lot in this without it losing its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Mizzy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, like it, but...
customer_reviews.text: We really like this product. We took them on a trip to Costa Rica. They were just the right size for the airplane and later on the tour bus. They are sturdy and look very nice. The only problem: shortly into our trip, one of the rivets reinforcing the handle broke off (see picture). Fortunately the sewing was strong enough to hold the handle thru the trip. I was able to replace the rivet when I got home, so all is ok now. I would definitely recommend these luggage bags.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought these bags to bring with us on a trip to Mexico. We were not allowed carry on luggage on our flight but were allowed a personal item. We were able to fit a surprising amount of stuff in these bags and they were the perfect size to fit under the seat. I looked at several different options online and am glad I choose these. Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy for horses

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive travel bags for Spirit airlines
customer_reviews.text: Brougt these two little bags for a long weekend in Florida and traveled on Spirit airlines no problem with them. The printed bag are a little bigger than the solid color but still holds quite a bit of clothing. If you pack-wisely you can fit summer clothes for a week vacation. They fit nicely underneath the seat and if you’re traveling in smaller planes these bags can go with you !
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design = Broken Strap
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the bags to be able to fit it easily under the seat. Thought it was pretty spacious for being such a small bag. But barely got to the boarding gate before one of the straps broke. I think it’s just poor design. Both sides of the strap should be connected to a buckle that’s connected to the bag. Instead the side that’s sewed directly to the bag is the one that busted.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CARRY ON
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bag! Very roomy, durable yet not heavy. I took it for the first time on our trip to Texas. It fits great on the floor by me on the airplane and I carried it with ease through the airports etc. on my shoulder. And I am not a tall/big person, yet it was very easy for traveling. I used it to carry my purse in it and all of our documents to get on our cruise etc. Great bag for me!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly L

customer_reviews.title: Strap most likely will break
customer_reviews.text: Great size and met Tahiti airlines requirements. Strap was coming undone on our way there then busted. Unable to remove the strap because strap isn’t detachable. Unable to sew it because of the amount of fray and location where it came off. Be careful of what you pack- bring large safety pins in case. The small ones don’t work either. It was kind of embarrassing traveling with a bo bo carryon bag during several small flights between Tahiti, Bora Bora, then back through several US airports.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Collier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect, I got 3 outfits, a pair of sneakers, a sweater, underwear and bras (2) along with toiletries in this bag. I am not sure how it will hold up because I have only used it once. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Worked as a personal item on Frontier for a weekend trip.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to use as a personal item for a weekend trip on Frontier. I had to be much more strategic about what I wore on the flight and what items I packed. But I had no issues carrying this and a winter jacket onto the Frontier flight and staying warm and in clean clothes during the weekend trip. Well worth the $16 for this bag to save $35 each way that Frontier charges for normal sized carryon bags and even normal sized backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT bag, perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as the "free" carry-on bag for both Frontier and Spirit airlines. I was shocked at the amount of stuff you could fit in it, and that the bag still easily fit under the seat in front of us on the plane... despite the cramped leg space. I was never questioned once, about the size of my bag. It was perfect, and I will be using it again to travel with!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: Great simple and big cargo
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work for my wallet, glasses, coffee and lunch. It's a very simple design with one big compartment which is what I wanted vs a bunch of needless interior side pockets. It's lasted half a year so far with no issues, I bought a second for backup in case they stop making them. Good Value.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Bag it fit perfect for under the seat on Allegiant no extra cost!. Also so much can fit in this bag don’t underestimate the bag it’s good quality and good cost take a chance on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after ONE use
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the item, I was very excited to use the bag since it held many items in an organized manner. By the time I reached my destination after first use of an eight-hour international flight, the bag's strap was ripped so that I could no longer wear it on my shoulder, but instead had to hold onto the straps. Of course, this was not ideal as I had a large suitcase + carry-on, too. My items inside the bag included a few toiletries, headphones, and a monthly planner, so the bag should have held up longer. I wish I would have saved my money.
customer_reviews.author: Megi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag to use as a diaper bag...and it works WONDERFULLY!! The main pocket is the perfect size for all baby’s necessary items (diapers, wipes, bottles, spare clothes, changing pad, etc.) and the smaller front pocket is what I use as my “purse” and it holds my keys, wallet, phone, and other random purse stuff. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Used for spirit airlines
customer_reviews.text: Great little bag to avoid fees by spirit and frontier airlines. I packed a weekend of stuff in the little bag and I was all set. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: FLRoadman

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality given the price.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize I had purchased a two pack until I received the bag. Feels fairly decently made, considering how affordable they are. I typically buy Maxpedition bags and this bag is nowhere near the quality and has none of the features of a Maxpedition bag, but it's also a tenth of the price. I don't expect years and years of use from this bag, but it should serve its purpose as an occasional free carry on for Spirit Airlines flights.
customer_reviews.author: Beerfish

customer_reviews.title: Fits under airplane seat!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bag, its all that they say.....fits under seat, holds more than you think it would, fits over another suitcase for easy carrying and looks good. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Personal item approved for Frontier!
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this bag to avoid paying to check a bag while flying with Frontier 5/2/19. This bag is tiny but fits 5 jumpsuits, 1 set of pajamas, 1 pair of sandals, all my toiletries, makeup bag, and phone chargers. This bag met the 1 free personal requirement and it fits under the seat perfectly. Overall I am very happy with this bag, it's lightweight and classy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth your coins!
customer_reviews.text: This bag surpassed my expectations. It is Frontier and Spirit approved. I stuffed it with 4 jeans, 5 long sleeves, undergarments, socks, a pair of pjs, makeup, medications, and other travel toiletries and it all fit!!! The bag did not tear at all. It held everything. It fit perfectly as a personal bag. Great for weekend travelers and quick trips. I bought 3 for our travels for each person and no complains.
customer_reviews.author: Ziah_8.32

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to give a review without using this first. We used this as our personal item for the flights. It held my purse, as well as everything we would need to make a long, boring international flight tolerable. I admit I was a little nervous because of the reviews where the strap became torn, but it came through without any problems and we were a tad rough with them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This is always my personal item when I fly. Fits a lot of stuff and also fits well under the seat. Bag also makes a great weekender bag. Been on many trips and has held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Orourke

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed it. I bought it to carry on top of my carry on bag. It fits perfectly on top of the carry on as well as underneath the seat in front of you. It seems very strong. I took it with me on a trip to Singapore, Vietnam & Phuket and it's going strong. I would definitely buy it again or buy it as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Paula H.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Not Fancy
customer_reviews.text: They say you get what you pay for, and that's true in this case; but that's also exactly what I wanted. I needed a very basic, inexpensive, small bag of this nature with a handle and shoulder strap to use as an airline personal item to stow under the seat. If that's what you want too, then this is for you. I was pleasantly surprised that it was so well made. It's a very nice, simple, basic container. This is not fancy, but it is very practical.
customer_reviews.author: His Eyes Open

customer_reviews.title: Just a lack of Velcro
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro on the back of this is so small it’s like 1.5 inches by 0.75 inches. The first bag lasted a good 5 day trip before the Velcro came off and moved to the next one. As a flight attendant I go through these bags and give recommendations but this one would be excellent if the Velcro was much bigger and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Magee

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Last minute purchase so I didn’t have time to do a ton of research. However, it was perfect for my trip and a perfect carry on size
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Thin material, stinks, have to air it out, prob won't last more than 2-3 trips
customer_reviews.text: Stinks!!! Why does everything made in China smell like this? Oh right they spray chemicals in them to kill bugs for shipment! I aired it out for a full month before I used it. It's thin and cheap, it didn't fall apart on a trip to Europe, but I imagine it will on another 2 or 3 uses. it barely fits under most seats, don't stuff it full. The strap doesn't adjust, the included lock is a joke, just throw it out - it's plastic! Basically, it's super cheap in cost and material, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Your Average American Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these, one for myself and one for husband. We use these all the time. They are the perfect size for traveling to carry personal items or just for an overnight bag. Holds a lot for it's size and is very durable. Both bags are black, so I tie on a bright bandana to distinguish mine from hubby's.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyDay

customer_reviews.title: This bag is the perfect size to use as carry on for under the ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size to use as carry on for under the seat. I use it instead of a backpack or tote. I was able to pack a few shirts, sneakers, umbrella, raincoat and other small items that I would carry in my pocketbook. I brought this and a 22" carry on bag for an eleven day trip to Ireland. No checked bags. Yeah!!!! I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because as you can see this is no fashion statement. It definitely served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kirk

product_meta.title: 2 PCS 16-inch Carry On Hand Luggage Flight Duffle Personal or Underseat Bag 19L
feature_bullets: Designed Specifically as Approved Personal Item size on American Airlines, Delta Airlines, Southwest Airlines, United Airlines, Jetblue Airways, Spirit Airlines, Frontier Airlines, Virgin America & Sun Country
Each Bag Dimensions: 16x10x6" / Capacity: 19L / Weighs Only 1.1lbs
Adjustable shoulder carry strap - extra support and flexible to fit all sizes
Extra zip pocket on front to help sort extra items such as passports/tickets/ adaptors/toiletries/tissues etc
Robust & Smooth heavy duty zippers on main body that can be locked with the supplied key padlock

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,773 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
